model

Class MazeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MazeManager

  • public class MazeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages a Maze Each method communicates with DataBaseFacade which makes the link with the Database

    • Method Detail

      • generateMaze

        public void generateMaze(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.Integer length,
                         java.lang.Integer width,
                         Person creator)
                  throws PolymazeException
        Method to create a Maze. This method creates a maze using the currently selected algorithm, add it to the list of existing mazes, and adds it to the DB.
        Parameters:
        name - the Maze's name
        length - the Maze's length
        width - the Maze's width
        creator - the Person who created the Maze
        Throws:
        PolymazeException

      • generateMazeWithStartEnd

        public void generateMazeWithStartEnd(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Integer length,
                                     java.lang.Integer width,
                                     int startX,
                                     int startY,
                                     int endX,
                                     int endY,
                                     Person creator)
                              throws PolymazeException
        Method to create a Maze. This method creates a maze using the currently selected algorithm, add it to the list of existing mazes, and adds it to the DB.
        Parameters:
        name - the Maze's name
        length - the Maze's length
        width - the Maze's width
        startX - the Maze's starting point coordinate in X
        startY - the Maze's starting point coordinate in Y
        endX - the Maze's ending point coordinate in X
        endY - the Maze's ending point coordinate in Y
        creator - the Person who created the Maze
        Throws:
        PolymazeException
